SDG_TARGET:
3.a

Strengthen the implementation of the World Health Organization Framework Convention on Tobacco Control in all countries, as appropriate
SDG_INDICATOR:
3.a.1

Age-standardized prevalence of current tobacco use among persons aged 15 years and older
SDG_CUSTODIAN_AGENCIES: World Health Organization (WHO) Framework Convention on Tobacco Control (FCTC)
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Indicator available

Percentage of men/women age 15-49 who smoke cigarettes or a pipe or use other tobacco products

Definition

The indicator is defined as the percentage of the population aged 15 years and over who currently use any tobacco product (smoked and/or smokeless tobacco) on a daily or non-daily basis.
DATA_COMP:
It is calculated as;

Number of Current tobacco users age 15-19 years / Total population

“Current users” include both daily and non-daily users of smoked or smokeless tobacco
COVERAGE:
Earliest available data

Latest available data

2014-15

Geographical coverage

National

Disaggregation

  • Geographical: National, Province, District, Residence (Urban & Rural)
  • Sex
  • Education
  • Maternity status
  • wealth quintiles
